issue.title: [CF 577] Show an icon excluding the middle of a duration/stack
issue.body:
There is currently a way to display an icon while a certain minimum and maximum durations are met.  This only works if the Minimum is less than the Maximum.  So, for a buff with a duration of 10 seconds, you could get it to display between seconds 3 through 7.

Is it possible to display during the other part of the set?  Such that, for the same 10 second buff, it is displayed for seconds 0 through 3 and 7 through 10?  Or simply, rather than 3 < T < 7, instead display during 7 < T < 3?

(Also, is it possible to apply this condition to stacks?  The specific conditions I'd like to apply it to are when Metamorphosis is Above 800 or Below 300.)


> Posted by CurseForge user theondry | Imported from CurseForge issue #577 | Raw

comments.body:
The best way to do this would be to use conditions instead of the duration/stack requirements on the main tab.

The duration/stack requirements on the main tab were initially added as a quick and easy way to set these requirements so that you don't have to go and setup conditions just to do something so basic. What you are describing is a little more advanced, so it would best be done with conditions (Since conditions allow you to specify the operators of the requirements and the boolean logic between the two.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
